subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As boisterous and supportive as the crowd has been at Nassau Coliseum, the fans cannot score power-play goals, and the Islanders need all the determination they can muster.
snippet: As boisterous and supportive as the crowd has been at Nassau Coliseum, the fans cannot score power-play goals, and the Islanders need all the determination they can muster.
